DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test latanoprost punctal plug reduce eye pressure subject ocular hypertension open-angle glaucoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Latanoprost Punctal Plug Delivery System ( L-PPDS ) Subjects With Ocular Hypertension Open-Angle Glaucoma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed bilateral OH OAG topical prostaglandin monotherapy bilaterally standard care treatment OH OAG . Adequate IOP control topical prostaglandin monotherapy past 1 month . Functionally significant vision loss , progressive field loss within last year . Contact lens wear time treatment period . Keratoconjunctivitis sicca require chronic topical artificial tear , lubricant , and/or Restasis® . Active lid disease ( i.e. , moderate severe blepharitis , meibomianitis ) require medical treatment . Subjects ≥0.9 vertical cup completely notch optic nerve head rim . Currently chronic ocular topical medication Currently ophthalmic systemic steroid therapy . Laser surgery glaucoma within last 3 month 6 month incisional surgery . History macular edema History chronic/recurrent inflammatory eye disease . History nonresponse topical prostaglandin therapy . Subjects epiphora .
